name: Scrap Chasers
description:
Eyyyy what you think you doing! You are supposed to be collecting scrap for me in my ship. What do you mean its dangerous in that sector! That's where the best pickings are.

Controls

W A S D: To move around the ship

Avoid the obstacles and projectiles whilst collecting as large a value of scrap as possible. Be careful you will have to warp out of there if you take too much damage!

Made by team Sand Advertisement.

*Edited to remove Copyrighted image*
